item.title: Developer Velocity
item.description: Session description Join Steph and Chris as they run through Microsoft’s transformation from shipping boxed products to always-on online services. Developer Velocity is a critical part of that journey to ensure the teams can keep delivering value to their end-users at scale. In this session, you will learn about some of the tips & tricks that Microsoft used along the way. Slides Video Presentation history May 4th 2022 @ Hybrid Virtual Group with Chris Reddington
